freemarker.core

接口 ParserConfiguration

  • 所有已知实现类:
    _ParserConfigurationWithInheritedFormat, Configuration, TemplateConfiguration

    public interface ParserConfiguration
    Don't implement this interface yourself; use the existing implementation(s). This interface is implemented by classes that hold settings that affect parsing. New parser settings can be added in new FreeMarker versions, which will break your implementation.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.3.24

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ArithmeticEngine getArithmeticEngine()
      Overlaps with Configurable.getArithmeticEngine(); the parser needs this for creating numerical literals.
      int getAutoEscapingPolicy()
      See Configuration.getAutoEscapingPolicy().
      Version getIncompatibleImprovements()
      See Configuration.getIncompatibleImprovements().
      int getInterpolationSyntax()
      See Configuration.getInterpolationSyntax().
      int getNamingConvention()
      See Configuration.getNamingConvention().
      OutputFormat getOutputFormat()
      See Configurable.getOutputEncoding().
      boolean getRecognizeStandardFileExtensions()
      See Configuration.getRecognizeStandardFileExtensions().
      boolean getStrictSyntaxMode()
      See Configuration.getStrictSyntaxMode().
      int getTabSize()
      See Configuration.getTabSize().
      int getTagSyntax()
      See Configuration.getTagSyntax().
      boolean getWhitespaceStripping()
      See Configuration.getWhitespaceStripping().
